body:
Comment 2: 
For gri: should we accept (T).foo. The 6g compiler does now, so we it sounds like we
should probably keep accepting it. So this would be a spec change. (This happens because
the parser doesn't know whether T is a type or a variable name until later.)

The 6g compiler does reject (math).Sin, thankfully.
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
